lead_paragraph: A report in the Goal soccer roundup on Tuesday about safety concerns for this year’s World Cup in South Africa in the aftermath of an attack on Togo’s national team in Angola on Friday misstated the number of players that Arsenal sent to play for Ivory Coast in the African Cup of Nations there. It was one player (Emmanuel Eboué), not two.
